name: Katja Prototype
description:
You play as Katja, a determined girl who pursues a strange silhouette in her dreams.

This is a prototype rushed in 2 weeks for a contest. Menus aren't great and keybinds are atrocious. We spent quite some time on environments and mood though.

We added a lot of mechanics that could be interesting in a full game. You can upgrade your stats, use objects, throw fireballs, cast a force field, etc. It sounds overwhelming but you won't have to use everything. Just experiment with what's appealing to you.

Press [RB] or [D] to bring up a quick manual during the game.
